decision_conditions: The proposed siting and appearance would not be appropriate for this location as it would both constitute inappropriate development in the Green Belt and create an incongruous addition that would be visually intrusive in the surrounding views and internal views of the site detracting from the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would not accord with paragraphs 152 - 156 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023 and policies G2 of the London Plan and CS8, DM5 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
description: Installation of 25m high lattice mast to accommodate 6 no. Antenna, 15 no. RRU and 2 no. 0.3m dishes on new concrete base along with 4 no. equipment cabinets and 1 no. GPS module within 2.4m high fenced compound along with ancillary development thereto.
site_name: Chessington World Of Adventures Resort, South Car Park
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
